text: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
translation: So Allah gave them the reward of this world and the best reward of the Hereafter[67], for Allah loves those who do good.
footnotes: [67] Gaining victory in this life and eternal bliss in Paradise.
